original_title: Looney Tunes: Best Of Daffy And Porky
overview: They’re the ultimate animated odd couple. Together they starred in numerous timeless cartoon shorts highlighting the combination of their hilariously opposite personalities. Over the course of their remarkable careers, Daffy’s impulsive goofball tendencies would become ever more pronounced, while the endearing, stuttering Porky became more of a thinker than a mallet-wielding doer.
tagline: 14 Looney Tunes cartoon capers with Porky Pig and Daffy Duck
title: Looney Tunes: Best Of Daffy And Porky

titles.title: Looney Toons: Det Bedste Fra Daffy & Pelle Gris
